title: The Favorites - NFL Week 15 Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 15 Best Bets
description:
Outbreaks are ravaging NFL teams AND NFL betting markets this week, but Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman and his professional betting comrade Simon Hunter aren't scared away. In fact, today they outline more than a half-dozen picks they're looking to lock in before the weekend, including a strong belief in Mike Tomlin's Steelers and the Denver Broncos. Plus, Chad, Simon and producer Matt Mitchell comb through the many many reviews the podcast has received in recent weeks to select contest winners and give credit to the furious, hyper-critical listeners who love to listen despite hating nearly every about this show. We love all our listeners equally, and we appreciate it! After all, "feedback is a gift," as Chad Millman often says.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
